    /** @type {String} */
               ~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
    var S = "hello world";

               ~~~~~~

    var n = 10;

               ~

    anyT = "hello";

               ~

    var anyT1 = 2;
    anyT1 = "hi";

    const x = (a) => a + 1;
